0.8.name: wordpress/list-yo-files
0.8.description: Allows users to easily display lists of files in their pages and posts. Supply the folder and various options and you can generate a list of files with hyperlinks to each file making it downloadable. Extensive options let you sort and filter files. You can include file size, date, and even an icon as part of the file list. You can even display lists of MP3s in popular audio players. The plugin admin pages also allow you to conveniently upload and delete files. This is a easy way for organizations, groups, and clubs to share files with members. For example, Home Owner Associations have used this plugin to list their minutes. Music websites use this plugin to allow their users to show off their music.
